name: Alex Rivera
title: Principal Cloud Architect at Contoso
bio: Alex has spent over a decade designing distributed systems at scale. A frequent conference speaker and open-source contributor, they specialize in making complex infrastructure accessible to small teams.

name: Priya Sharma
title: Head of Design Systems at Northwind
bio: Priya leads a team of designers and engineers building component libraries used by thousands of developers. She is passionate about accessibility and believes great design systems are invisible.

name: Jordan Kim
title: Senior UX Engineer
bio: Jordan bridges the gap between design and engineering, focusing on interaction patterns and motion design in web applications.

name: Sam Okafor
title: Developer Advocate
bio: Sam helps developers build better tools. With a background in both frontend and backend engineering, they focus on CLI design, SDK ergonomics, and documentation.
